item.description:
Archery is a lot of fun. I have been going to Ace Archers for a few years now. Nice friendly staff, and they rent all equipment and show you how to use it. This range is primarily a recurve shop.

Price is $12/hr and includes all equipment you need. We will be shooting for an hour, but you're welcome to shoot longer if you want.

See ya there :)

p.s. GPS can be inaccurate getting to this place. It's by World Gym in a brick building near a pond. If you went past the pond, you probably went too far. If you're coming from the north headed down, then your GPS might take you 100 yards or so before you reach the place. So be careful with GPS directions and Google map it first.

 

Google map
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs, 3rd floor - follow signs for Ace Archers
item.name: Try Archery in Foxboro, Ace Archers
